title: Hey guys Darius here
body:
Riot still won't nerf ranged top 3 years later so I decided to become ranged too. 

https://i.redd.it/yydiyt108ll21.png

You know what they say. If you can't beat em, join em!

replies.body: easily the simplest fix, just give all melees +400 range, then  the game's fixed
Except it wouldn't be fixed.  There is a reason that nearly every melee has better base stats on everything than almost every ranged.
r/wooooosh

I know it is a joke but it is a dumb joke.  It is a joke that people think Darius needs a way to fight ranged when he gives immobile melees absolutely no way to fight him.  He can right click a tank before going afk and win just from auto attacks.

> [{quoted}](name=stoyo8,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6WFmLiTr,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-15T00:34:39.235+0000)
>
> You do realize darius get's outperformed by tanks in team fights?

No he doesn't lol.

> [{quoted}](name=stoyo8,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6WFmLiTr,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-15T03:15:13.427+0000)
>
> By the time darius has 60% armour reduction with like  3500 hp, the tank has 80% armour reduction with more hp than darius (and more mr) and various abilities that provides shields (effecitley increasing their tankiness), and cc to lock down darius. Ok sure, Darius will obviously win the 1v1 and maybe even smaller skirmishes, but in a 5v5, darius would be blown up, kited, and cc'ed way faster than the tank, considering how high damage is rn. 
> 
> I've gone 6/0 against a Nautilus as Darius once, in team fights, by the time I broke through his shield I was already at 30% hp. and cc'ed.

Darius has a scaling heal, passive armor penetration, a humongous stat steroid, one of the strongest melee slows and synergies with Trinity Force for split pushing and teamfighting all in one, and an ultimate that ignores all defenses and resets on a kill. In other words, tag a couple of people with Q, Eautowauto and he's already roided up and if your ADC's aren't completely braindead they'll help the darius shred through the enemy tank as the ult lands and he can snowball the rest of the fight.

The only reason he hasn't seen play is because aggressive mobile bruisers (like a good Fiora/Jax/Trynda/Renekton and even a high caliber Riven) that shut him down in lane early have been strong. The moment early burst damage in lane gets nerfed and he can get back to extended trades he runs over the competition.

Darius is one of the biggest counters to Yorick and Irelia and goes even against a lot of other bruisers while completely annihilating tanks and being a better teamfighter than Fiora/Tryndamere/Jax could ever hope to be. Jax also has the distinct drawback of taking forever to get up to speed if he doesn't get fed in lane.

Yorick is one of Darius's worst match ups.

Darius is only a lane counter to tanks, which is why he seldom appears as a priority pick in tank metas because he's incredibly easy to lock down and kill or disengage and deny his passive; he actually does best in durable focused bruiser metas such as early season 7 when every fighter was running Courage of the Colossus. His ability to carry depends heavily on the general chaos of SoloQ fiesta to pop off or for a team comp designed around him to give him as much target access as he wants.

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6WFmLiTr,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-15T04:58:03.927+0000)
>
> Yorick is one of Darius's worst match ups.
> 
> Darius is only a lane counter to tanks, which is why he seldom appears as a priority pick in tank metas because he's incredibly easy to lock down and kill or disengage and deny his passive; he actually does best in durable focused bruiser metas such as early season 7 when every fighter was running Courage of the Colossus. His ability to carry depends heavily on the general chaos of SoloQ fiesta to pop off or for a team comp designed around him to give him as much target access as he wants.

That's only because most Darius don't punish Yorick trying to dig graves. By lv1-3 everytime he goes to Q a minion you should beat him up over it as without the ghouls he will get cheesed by lv2.
Yorick is a bad matchup for Darius and irelia is a skill matchup completely dependent on irelia's skill level.

The best toplaners are mostly melee. I mostly play melees top, and i would say you are making us top laners look bad. You are making us look almost like marksmen mains whining they are replaced with 90+ % pickrate in their lane.

I disagree with this sentiment though.  Darius is a juggernaut, he's supposed to get beat by ranged XD and if he flashes, they either have to burn flash or die
Just get those trash grabber things as Darius. Easy +200 range if you spaghetti them like this.
/J he can just call in his friend corki for an air strike! /J

Now Darius' Passive gives him True Damage and Missing Health damage, increased per blood stack. The Q is now a passive, first level in and he will spin like URF Garen dealing % max health damage, and his Q will not interrupt his other abilities. His E goes to 1250 units, and his W now stuns for 3 seconds instead of slowing. Oh oh, here is the best part, his Ult has no cooldown or cost, and is global. That should put him back into the meta and should put Ranged champions to shame.
If ranged champs are so unfair top why arent they the dominant class?
this man is so handsome{{sticker:sg-lux}}

The more important question is why are draven's weapons called axes when they are clearly far more sword than axe.
It's like calling darius' weapon a spear. Also fix toplane yadda yadda nerf ranged all that.
and why his "axes" bounce like bouncing balls when they are supposed to cut through people
